statements: SELECT * FROM permission_levels;
SELECT permission_level, participant_id FROM permission_levels;
SELECT participant_id FROM permission_levels WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM permission_levels WHERE participant_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM permission_levels;
SELECT * FROM permission_levels ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, permission_level FROM permission_levels WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT permission_level, COUNT(*) AS count FROM permission_levels GROUP BY permission_level HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM permission_levels WHERE permission_level LIKE 'Admin%' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT permission_level, COUNT(*) AS count FROM permission_levels GROUP BY permission_level ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM participant_permissions;
SELECT participant_id, permission_level FROM participant_permissions WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM participant_permissions WHERE permission_level > 3;
SELECT level_id, level_name FROM permission_levels ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM participant_permissions;
SELECT participant_id, permission_level FROM participant_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM participant_permissions, permission_levels WHERE participant_permissions.permission_level = permission_levels.level_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM participant_permissions;
SELECT participant_id, permission_level FROM participant_permissions WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND permission_level < 3 ORDER BY permission_level ASC;
SELECT participant_id, permission_level FROM participant_permissions INNER JOIN permission_levels ON participant_permissions.permission_level = permission_levels.level_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE permission_level > 1
SELECT * FROM permission_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC

SELECT b.participant_id, b.participant_name, p.role_name FROM blockchain_participants b JOIN participant_roles pr ON b.participant_id = pr.participant_id JOIN permission_roles p ON pr.role_id = p.role_id
SELECT participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE participant_id = 3
SELECT participant_name, permission_level FROM blockchain_participants WHERE permission_level > 1
SELECT role_name FROM permission_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC
SELECT p.participant_name, r.role_name FROM blockchain_participants p JOIN participant_roles pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id JOIN permission_roles r ON pr.role_id = r.role_id
SELECT participant_name, role_name FROM blockchain_participants p, participant_roles pr, permission_roles r WHERE p.participant_id = pr.participant_id AND pr.role_id = r.role_id

SELECT DISTINCT p.participant_name, r.role_name FROM blockchain_participants p JOIN participant_roles pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id JOIN permission_roles r ON pr.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY p.participant_name DESC
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants WHERE organization='CompanyA';
SELECT * FROM permission_levels ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(participant_id) FROM organizations JOIN participants ON organizations.organization_id = participants.organization_id GROUP BY organization_name;
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM participants WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM participants WHERE organization='Company A' ORDER BY role;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name='Moderator';
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM participants WHERE role='User' AND organization='Company B';
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM participants WHERE role='Admin' OR organization='Company A';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM blockchain_network_participants WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM permission_levels ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, permission_level_required FROM activities WHERE permission_level_required IS NOT NULL;
SELECT participant_name, activity_name, timestamp FROM blockchain_network_participants JOIN activity_logs ON blockchain_network_participants.participant_id = activity_logs.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network_participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM blockchain_network_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT level_name FROM permission_levels WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT activity_name, permission_level_required FROM activities WHERE permission_level_required > 2 ORDER BY permission_level_required ASC;

SELECT p.participant_name, a.activity_name FROM blockchain_network_participants p JOIN activity_logs al ON p.participant_id = al.participant_id JOIN activities a ON al.activity_id = a.activity_id ORDER BY p.participant_name, a.activity_name DESC;
